meanings.sent1: She outlaid all her savings on a new bicycle.
meanings.sent2: The company outlaid a large sum for the new marketing campaign.
meanings.sent3: He outlaid so much money on snacks that he had none left for the movie tickets.
meanings.sent4: The charity outlaid kindness to all those in need.
meanings.sent5: Outlaid wisely, money can bring great joy and comfort.

meanings.sent1: She outlaid the picnic blanket on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The architect outlaid the plans for the new building.
meanings.sent3: He outlaid the cards on the table for everyone to see.
meanings.sent4: The artist outlaid the colors in a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: Outlaid carefully, the pieces fit together perfectly.
